info.description: This is my first theme made ever so it surely contains bugs, if you found any let me know on discord (Dogel#0339) or in the comments.
info.additionalInfo: This is remake of "For Kaori" theme made by elixeria. You can find it here: https://kinda-static.userstyles.org/styles/155226/for-kaori-roblox-theme
